    • calcSimpleAvg

      public static double calcSimpleAvg(double[] testGrades)
      Calculates the simple average of four percentages.
      Parameters:
      testGrades - An array of test grades on each category
      Returns:
      The simple average of over the four categories, rounded to the nearest whole number.

    • calcWeightedAvg

      public static double calcWeightedAvg(double[] testGrades)
      Calculates the weighted average of four percentages.
      Parameters:
      testGrades - An array of test grades on each category.
      Returns:
      The weighted average of over the four categories, rounded to the nearest whole number.

    • gradesToString

      public static String gradesToString(double[] testGrades, double simpleAvg, double weightedAvg)
      Return a grade report that shows the marks in all four categories along with both averages.
      Parameters:
      testGrades - An array of test grades on each category.
      simpleAvg - The simple average of the grades.
      weightedAvg - The weighted average of the grades.
      Returns:
      A string of the above form that can be printed to console.

    • whatToPractice

      public static String whatToPractice(double[] testGrades)
      Finding the lowest grade and telling the user what they should practice.
      Parameters:
      testGrades - An array of test grades on each category.
      Returns:
      A sentence describing which category you should practice more.
